snippet: Lehman Brothers has been waiting for the real estate market to improve so it can sell its properties at higher prices than it would have received during the depth of the financial crisis.
abstract: Lehman Brothers continues to wait for the real estate market to improve so that it can sell its properties at higher prices than it would have received during the depth of the financial crisis; estate of failed investment bank continues to control more than $10 billion of real estate assets in its $40.5 billion portfolio, including several prominent Manhattan properties.
lead_paragraph: Lehman Brothers has been waiting for the real estate market to improve so it can sell its properties at higher prices than it would have received during the depth of the financial crisis.

headline.seo: Lehman Brothers, With Much Real Estate to Sell, Is Biding Its Time
headline.main: Lehman Is Biding Its Time to Market Its Real Estate
headline.print_headline: Lehman Is Biding Its Time to Market Its Real Estate
